pullRequest.title: Added query_setup_time to default public metric set, replacing query_collateral_time
pullRequest.bodyText: I confirm that this contribution is made under the terms of the license found in the root directory of this repository's source tree and that I have the authority necessary to make this contribution on behalf of its copyright owner.

commit.message: Added content.proton.documentdb.matching.rank_profile.query_setup_time.average to default public metric set. Replaces query_collateral_time

nodes.bodyText: Internally, we are calculating a more correct average based on sum and count, so we should not include it here.
The class where queryCollateralTimeAvg is defined must have a 'TODO Vespa 8'
Add 'TODO Vespa 8' where appropriate, either here or somewhere to make this line fail compilation when the metric is removed.

beforeCommit.message: Removed query_setup_time averages in metric set. Added TODO comments for removing old metric

afterCommit.message: Removed query_setup_time averages in metric set. Added TODO comments for removing old metric
